auth.subtitle: VND to USDC conversion wallet for Vietnam
auth.terms: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
auth.demoNote: Demo: zkLogin generates seedless wallet from your OAuth account

kyc.title: Verify Your Identity
kyc.subtitle: Required to access VND conversion features
kyc.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your information...
kyc.successMessage: Your identity has been verified successfully
kyc.demoNote: Demo Mode: KYC will auto-approve. Real FPT.AI integration planned for production.

location.title: Location Check
location.subtitle: VND features available in sandbox zones only
location.verifyingZone: Verifying you're within the sandbox zone...
location.withinZone: You're within the Da Nang sandbox zone
location.outsideMessage: VND conversion features require being within the Da Nang sandbox area
location.canViewBalance: You can still view your balance and receive USDC
location.deniedMessage: Enable location access in Settings to use VND conversion features
location.privacyNote: Your location is only checked once per session. We never store GPS coordinates.
location.whyNeeded: Vietnam's crypto regulations require geographic verification. Phase 1 sandbox operates within a 500m radius of designated locations in Da Nang.

convert.title: Convert
convert.instructions: Open your banking app, scan this QR code, and complete the transfer. Your USDC will be credited automatically.
convert.vndTransferInitiated: VND transfer initiated to your bank account
convert.smartSellActive: Your Smart Sell order is active
convert.accessDenied: Complete KYC and location verification to trade

settings.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?

bankForm.holderHint: Enter name exactly as shown on bank account
